abstract: Just as companies put their names on sports stadiums, a line of grooming products intends to brand a dating arena.
snippet: Just as companies put their names on sports stadiums, a line of grooming products intends to brand a dating arena.
lead_paragraph: Axe is a brand meant for the pick-up artist. That much was made clear in a recent online-only commercial for an Axe exfoliating body wash. It flashed scenes from a young man’s unromantic sleepover with a young woman, and exhorted viewers to “scrub away” the memory.

headline.main: Axe Body Products Puts Its Brand on the Hamptons Club Scene
headline.print_headline: Axe Body Products Puts Its Brand on the Hamptons Club Scene
